channel.title: Macchiato Monsters: Operation Unfathomable
channel.description:
BEHOLD!!! ...the Underworld in all its bewildering majesty as titanic Chaos godlings and their unsavory cults make genocidal war upon one another!
EXPLOIT!!! ...a trail of dead horrors supplied by the recent, doomed expedition of powerful heroes!
SEIZE!!! ...eldritch artifacts and treasures far above your lowly station!
PONDER!!! ...the mind-bending riddles and inscrutable anomalies of reality itself in an overwhelming cascade of cosmic secrets!
THRILL!!! ...as you throw the gauntlet of your life into the smug face of the unknowable and embark upon this…
![op%20title|690x407,75%](upload://nAi1d1dm22IUF5P0c1N9hAKqHVO.png)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------- We will be playing three sessions of Operation Unfathomable by The Hydra Cooperative, using Macchiato Monsters. Due to high lethality, we will be creating two PCs in the first session.
The tone of the module is a gonzo pulp comedy mashup of science fantasy and high fantasy. All subject matter is treated ironically and unseriously.
We will be using Script Change by Brie Sheldon (http://www.briecs.com/p/script-change-rpg-tool.html) as well as Lines and Veils for safety. Please review the content warnings to see if you feel comfortable, as it will be impossible to make this adventure anything other than gonzo. I will do my best to accommodate all players in the group.
We will be using Roll20 to manage the map and images, and Google Sheets for our character keeper.
Content Warnings: Graphic comedy violence (think Itchy & Scratchy), body horror, mind alteration, mental illness (“insanity,” “madness,” “psychosis,” depression), claustrophobia, dark subterranean spaces, genocide (not treated seriously), insects, fungi, bats.
